sub_topic: Identifying the planarity of a graph.
message_1:
Consider the graph G shown below. Determine if G is planar or not.

```
     A ------- B
      |         |
      |         |
     C ------- D
    / |       | \
   /  |       |  \
  E   |       |   F
   \  |       |  /
    \ |       | /
     G ------- H
```

Hint: A graph is considered planar if it can be drawn on a plane without any of its edges crossing.
message_2:
The given graph G is planar. We can redraw the graph without any of its edges crossing as follows:

```
     A ------- B
      |         |
      |         |
     C ------- D
      |         |
      |         |
     G ------- H
      |         |
      |         |
     E ------- F
```

In this representation, no edges are crossing, so the graph is planar.
